body:
- Upgrade to RxJava 3.0.3
- Fix an issue with internal imports for OSGi usages by copying over relevant functions from RxJava (#55)

name: 3.0.0-RC2
body:
- Upgrade to RxJava 3.0.0-RC2
- Upgrade to Reactive Streams 1.0.3-RC1
- Move `RxJavaInterop` to `hu.akarnokd.rxjava3.interop`.

name: 3.0.0-RC0
body: Upgrade to the **RxJava 3.x** line. No API or behavior changes in respect to the 2.x line.
- [Pull 23](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Interop/pull/23): Fix copy-paste error in the `RxJavaInterop.toV1Scheduler()` JavaDoc.

- Upgrade to **RxJava 1.3.5**.
- [Pull 22](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Interop/pull/22): Add converter from v2 `Scheduler` to v1 `Scheduler` via `RxJavaInterop.toV1Scheduler()`.
- [Commit 1961f601](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Interop/commit/1961f60111a24b5621fbd8af6c9343c03e25b5f0) Add converter from v1 `Scheduler` to v2 `Scheduler`  via `RxJavaInterop.toV2Scheduler()`.

### Bugfix

- [Commit 2cf22f62](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Interop/commit/2cf22f6265dbfc7361dfc72884d069a599ee95b0): Fix `unsubscribe` not being called for v1 `Observable` when the `Observable` terminates. ([Issue #21](https://github.com/akarnokd/RxJava2Interop/issues/21)).

- Upgrade to RxJava 1.3.3.
- Upgrade to Gradle 4.2.1

- Upgrade to RxJava 2.0.9
- Use `FlowableSubscriber` in the v2 Flowable to v1 Observable conversion (less overhead).

- Update dependency to RxJava 1.2.6
- Add `RxJavaInterop.toV1Subject` conversion
- Add `RxJavaInterop.toV2Subject` conversion
- Add `RxJavaInterop.toV2Processor` conversion
- Add `RxJavaInterop.toV1Transformer` conversions
- Add `RxJavaInterop.toV2Transformer` conversions
- Add `RxJavaInterop.toV1Operator` conversion
- Add `RxJavaInterop.toV2Operator` conversion
- Fix #10: v1 Observables may request zero which is now ignored.
Same as 0.7.0. Maven central doesn't seem to see version 0.7.0 thus the version bump.

- Upgrade dependency to RxJava 2.0.0 final
- No API or behavior changes
Added conversion from v1 `Single` to v2 `Maybe`, v1 `Completable` to v2 `Maybe`, v2 `Maybe` to v1 `Single` and v2 `Maybe` to v1 `Completable`.

name: v0.3.0
body: Updated to reference RxJava 1.2.0 and RxJava 2.0.0-RC3
Updated to recent RxJava 2.x snapshot API.
